sections.heading: Action to recover for damage done by livestock which break through lawful fence3-1428
sections.text: Action to recover for damage done by livestock which break through lawful fenceA. The owner or occupant of land enclosed by a lawful fence upon which damage of less than two hundred dollars has been done by livesto
